message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,400,000. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, the value of this product is significantly higher than your offer. I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $1,300,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me.
